trans-unit.source: Provides extension methods to create and retrieve reflection-based parts.
trans-unit.target: 提供擴充方法以建立和擷取反映式部分。

trans-unit.source: The member to export.
The contract name to use for the export.
The metadata for the export.
The object that the export originates from.
trans-unit.target: 從其中產生匯出的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an export definition from the specified member, with the specified contract name, metadata, and origin.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、中繼資料和原點，從指定的成員建立匯出定義。

trans-unit.source: An export definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯出定義。

trans-unit.source: Creates an import definition for a member or parameter.
trans-unit.target: 建立成員或參數的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to import.
The contract name to use for the import.
The required type identity for the import.
The required metadata for the import.
The cardinality of the import.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the import's creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定匯入的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: The object to import into.
Creates an import definition for the specified parameter by using the specified contract name, type identity, import metadata, cardinality, and creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、型別識別、匯入中繼資料、基數和建立原則，為指定的參數建立匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: An import definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The member to import into.
The contract name to use for the import.
The required type identity for the import.
The required metadata for the import.
The cardinality of the import.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import is recomposable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可重新撰寫匯入，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the import's creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定匯入的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: The object to import into.
Creates an import definition for the specified member by using the specified contract name, type identity, import metadata, cardinality, recomposition policy, and creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、型別識別、匯入中繼資料、基數、重新撰寫原則和建立原則，為指定的成員建立匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: An import definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to import.
The contract name to use for the import.
The required type identity for the import.
The required metadata for the import.
The cardinality of the import.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the import's creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定匯入的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: The contract metadata
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import represents an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示匯入代表 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to import into.
Creates an import definition for the specified parameter by using the specified contract name, type identity, import and contract metadata, cardinality, and creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、型別識別、匯入和合約中繼資料、基數和建立原則，為指定的參數建立匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: An import definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The member to import into.
The contract name to use for the import.
The required type identity for the import.
The required metadata for the import.
The cardinality of the import.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import is recomposable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可重新撰寫匯入，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the import's creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定匯入的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: The contract metadata.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import represents an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示匯入代表 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to import into.
Creates an import definition for the specified member by using the specified contract name, type identity, import and contract metadata, cardinality, recomposition policy, and creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、型別識別、匯入和合約中繼資料、基數、重新撰寫原則和建立原則，為指定的成員建立匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: An import definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The member to import into.
The contract name to use for the import.
The required type identity for the import.
The required metadata for the import.
The cardinality of the import.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import is recomposable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可重新撰寫匯入，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import is a prerequisite; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示匯入為必要條件，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the import's creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，這個值指定匯入的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: The contract metadata.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the import represents an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示匯入代表 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to import into.
Creates an import definition for the specified member by using the specified contract name, type identity, import and contract metadata, cardinality, recomposition policy, and creation policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、型別識別、匯入和合約中繼資料、基數、重新撰寫原則和建立原則，為指定的成員建立匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: An import definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的匯入定義。

trans-unit.source: The type of the part.
<see langword="true" /> if the part requires disposal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果部分需要處置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the part's imports.
A collection of the part's exports.
The part's metadata.
The part's origin.
Creates a part definition with the specified part type, imports, exports, metadata, and origin.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的部分型別、匯入、匯出、中繼資料和原點，建立部分定義。

trans-unit.source: A part definition created from the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的參數建立的部分定義。

trans-unit.source: The import definition to represent.
Returns a representation of an import definition as an export factory product.
trans-unit.target: 傳回匯入定義代表做為匯出 Factory 產品。

trans-unit.source: The representation of the import definition.
The export definition to examine.
Gets the exporting member from a specified export definition.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的匯出定義取得進行匯出的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member specified in the export definition.
trans-unit.target: 匯出定義中指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="exportDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The import definition to examine.
Gets the importing member from a specified import definition.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的匯入定義取得進行匯入的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member specified in the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 匯入定義中指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="importDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The import definition to examine.
Gets the importing parameter from a specified import definition.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的匯入定義取得進行匯入的參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter specified in the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 匯入定義中指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="importDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The part definition to examine.
Gets the type of a part from a specified part definition.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的部分定義取得部分的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the defined part.
<paramref name="partDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The part to examine.
Determines whether the specified part requires disposal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的部分是否需要處置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the part requires disposal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果部分需要處置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="partDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The import definition to check.

Indicates whether a specified import definition represents an export factory (<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`2" /> object).
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的匯入定義是否代表匯出 Factory (<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`1" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportFactory`2" /> 物件)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified import definition represents an export factory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的匯入定義代表匯出 Factory，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The import definition to examine.
Determines whether an import definition represents a member or a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 判斷匯入定義是表示成員還是參數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the import definition represents a parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匯入定義表示參數，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="importDefinition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The part definition.
A collection of types to specify the generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 要指定泛型參數之型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the specialized part definition.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，會包含指定的組件定義。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a generic part definition can be specialized with the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指示泛用組件定義是否可使用提供的參數進行特製化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specialization succeeds; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果特製化成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" /> .
